body_html: @jgong5 you can build off of our Dockerfiles at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/tree/master/docker/caffe2/jenkins/ubuntu and the script in docker/caffe2/jenkins/build.sh . We only use these Dockers for our CI, so they're not especially user friendly. I'd recommend writing your own Dockerfile that includes a conda-install of Caffe2. If you have any requested changes to the conda packages then let me know.
